item.title: COMP9024 Midterm
item.description: COMP9024 Midterm Pointers Pass by value void swap(int a, int b) { int t = a; a = b; b = t; } void swap(int *a, int *b) { int t = *a; *a = *b; *b = t; } typedef struct { int x; int y; } Point; void init_point(Point *dst) { dst->x = 1; dst->y = 2; } Point *p = (Point *) malloc(sizeof(Point)); init_point(p); free(p); Exercise int
